column1: Ironville is an unincorporated community in Boyd County
column4: near the intersection of Kentucky Route 5 and Kentucky Route 766. Due to its proximity to Ashland
column5: Ironville is often considered to be a part of Ashland
column6: although officially it is separate from the city and serves as a suburb to the city. It shares its ZIP code with Ashland as well.

column1: Ironville is a part of the Huntington-Ashland
column3: Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA). As of the 2000 census
column4: the MSA had a population of 288
